name: Dokkaebi Hentai Adventures
description: You play for anime-girl with an unusual name Dokkaebi, which hit the strange world after watching the anime-title, and you need to get out of this world, along the way, collecting lolly faces. Warning, in the world live chickens.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 40 MB available space Additional Notes: minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
